This year, Dove Science Academy High School OKC is ranked #1 (tie) in Math and Proficiency Performance in THE ENTIRE NATION by U.S. News!

U.S. News is a global authority when it comes to rankings and consumer advice. This year, their publication evaluated over 17,700 public high schools in the nation. Otherwise, we would have shown additional impressive results and a much higher overall ranking for the campus. Still, we can’t contain our excitement about this…

shared_text:
Dove Science Academy Middle School - Oklahoma City
November 18, 2019 at 5:15 PM ·

Ms. Kaysee (ELA) and Mr. Harry (Geography) designed a cross-subject collaborative project for our seventh graders! The project teaches the students about the geographical facts and cultures of countries in the Eastern hemisphere by challenging the students to use skills they have developed in ELA class such as research, analytical close reading, and summary writing. For the project, the students are working in groups to complete an internet scavenger hunt that requires them to research, read articles, and learn about the culture of their assigned country. Today, students began decorating posters in preparation to present information about their assigned country. Presentations will start on Wednesday.

As a character development extension of the project, students will learn compassion and generosity by finding out about specific crises and needs each country has recently experienced. The students will then organize and participate in a fundraiser to raise funds for international aid.

Stay tuned to follow the progress of this project and fund-raiser.
